entries.title: Dark Mode is here!
entries.description: We've added full support for dark mode across the dashboard, with automatic detection of your system preferences.
entries.description_md: We've added **full support for dark mode** across the dashboard, with automatic detection of your system preferences.

entries.title: Dashboard 2× Faster
entries.description: We've optimized data fetching and rendering — your dashboard now loads twice as fast!
entries.description_md: We've optimized **data fetching** and rendering — your dashboard now loads **twice as fast!**

entries.title: New Integrations: Slack & Notion
entries.description: You can now connect your workspace with Slack and Notion for real-time updates and sync.
entries.description_md: You can now connect your workspace with **Slack** and **Notion** for real-time updates and sync.

entries.title: Team Mentions in Comments
entries.description: You can now mention teammates using @username in any comment thread — they'll be notified instantly.
entries.description_md: You can now mention teammates using `@username` in any comment thread — they'll be notified instantly.

entries.title: Legacy API Endpoints Deprecated
entries.description: We're deprecating v1 API endpoints in favor of our improved v2 API. Support for v1 will end on December 31, 2025.
entries.description_md: We're deprecating **v1 API endpoints** in favor of our improved v2 API. Support for v1 will end on **December 31, 2025**.

entries.title: Fixed Pipeline Execution on Retry
entries.description: Resolved an issue where pipeline retries would fail to restore artifact state correctly.
entries.description_md: Resolved an issue where pipeline retries would fail to restore **artifact state** correctly.
